## flattenizer package

A library for flattening and unflattening objects.

## Remarks

Both exported functions will accept either undefined or null and return the same.

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [IFlattened](./flattenizer.iflattened.md) |  |
|  [IUnflattened](./flattenizer.iunflattened.md) |  |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [flatten](./flattenizer.flatten.md) | Flattens an object. |
|  [unflatten](./flattenizer.unflatten.md) | Unflattens an object with compressed keys. |
